title: Cedarwood + Patchouli Tallow Balm - Firming & Balancing
description:
Unleash Your Skin's Radiance with our Cedarwood + Patchouli Blend

 

Key Benefits:

  • Deep hydration: Grass-fed tallow, nature's ultimate moisturizer, penetrates deeply, locking in moisture and leaving your skin plump and dewy.
  • Radiant vitality: Organic olive oil and orange oil infuse your skin with antioxidants and vitamins, revealing a youthful, luminous complexion.
  • Calming balance: Cedarwood and patchouli oils' grounding aromas and anti-inflammatory properties soothe irritation, .
  • Invigorating uplift: Bergamot's bright citrus notes awaken the senses and leave your skin feeling refreshed and revitalized.

Full Ingredients: 

Grass fed & finished tallow, organic extra virgin olive oil, organic cedarwood oil, organic patchouli oil, organic bergamot oil, organic orange oil.

 

Benefits of each oil:

Cedarwood:

  • Toning & Tightening: Astringent properties help minimize pores and firm the skin, promoting a smooth, youthful appearance.
  • Blemish-fighting: Natural antibacterial and anti-inflammatory properties tackle blemishes and soothe irritation, leaving your skin clearer and calmer.
  • Calming & Grounding: Its woody aroma offers a relaxing sensory experience, calming redness and promoting overall skin health.

Patchouli:

  • Hydration: Deeply hydrates and retains moisture, combating dryness and promoting a plump, dewy complexion.
  • Antioxidant Powerhouse: Protects against free radical damage, preventing premature aging and maintaining a healthy skin glow.
  • Balancing Act: Balances sebum production for both oily and dry skin types, preventing breakouts and dryness.

 

Why Choose Pure Good Tallow?

  • Nature's perfect moisturizer: Rich in fatty acids and nutrients, tallow mimics your skin's natural oils, providing superior hydration and nourishment.
  • Sustainable and ethical: Our tallow is sourced from grass-fed, finished animals raised with care and respect by our family.
  • Clean and transparent: We believe in simple, effective ingredients, free from harsh chemicals and fillers.
  • Say goodbye to: Dryness, irritation, dullness, and the endless search for the perfect moisturizer.
  • Embrace: Smoothness, radiance, vitality, and a newfound confidence in your natural beauty.

Ready to unlock your skin's natural potential? Click "Add to Cart" and experience the transformative power of tallow.
